title: Drag Racing 3D v1.7.7 Build 64 APK + OBB Data [SadeemPC]
description:
Drag Racing 3D v1.7.7 build 64
Required Android 2.3+

Drag Racing 3D is exciting night street race!

They say that drag is the most impressive type of racing. It's the challege for only the most crackheaded and courageous drivers. You should use the full power of your car if you want to win!	

Features: 
Dynamic races by 1/4 and 1/2 mile 
More than 20 of these cars: from the urban sedans to professional sport cars 
A large number of combinations of improvements cars 
Ability to paint the car and rims any color 
Detailed statistics of each race and game progress 
Career mode allows you to go all racers way - from beginner to professional 
Quick Race mode helps to choose a unique opponent for each race 
Maintain records system can achieve better results in each race 
The game is fully translated for English and Russian languages
Attention! For comfortable game screen resolution should be 800x480 pixels and more!
In the settings you can select the desired level of graphics, thereby increasing the performance of your device.

What's new:
Fix physics engine
Better optimisation and bugs fixed
Infinity loading screen bug fixed
New aggresive Ford Mustang 1969!
Even more body kits! 1-2 kits for almost every car added!

Homepage 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mvasiliy.dragracing3d

OBB: copy to SDCardAndroidobb
